x-enumDescriptions.high: Use a higher reasoning effort to improve answer quality.
x-enumDescriptions.low: Use a lower reasoning effort for faster responses.
x-enumDescriptions.minimal: Use the lowest non-zero reasoning effort.
x-enumDescriptions.none: Restrict the model from performing any reasoning before emitting a final answer.
x-enumDescriptions.xhigh: Use the maximum reasoning effort available.

anyOf.description: Controls the level of reasoning effort the model should apply. Higher effort may increase latency and cost.

x-enumDescriptions.auto: Allow the model to decide when to summarize.
x-enumDescriptions.concise: Emit concise summaries of reasoning content.
x-enumDescriptions.detailed: Emit details summaries of reasoning content.

allOf.description: Controls whether the response includes a reasoning summary.

description: **gpt-5 and o-series models only** Configuration options for [reasoning models](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/reasoning).
